item.title: Hello terraform
item.description: I’m studying Terraform Up and Running book, a really good book but all the examples are for AWS. I have nothing against AWS, but I’m familiar with Azure, so I’d like to start porting some of the example of the book for Azure. While I’m not sure if I’ll keep up with the conversion, if you are curious I’ve started the work in this repository, feel free to post any correction (remember that I’m learning Terraform, I’m not an expert :))
